items.text: short of a length just outside off, looks to stab into the off side, gets it to mid-on off the inside half
items.postText: DW: "Henry's looked mighty impressive the last two ODIs. Surely a lock in for the world cup."
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the back foot into the leg side
items.postText: rowan findley: "Is there a collective noun for a group of umpires? i think it should be a "Decision of umpires"."
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.preText: Varun has taken a break for now. Astle continues
items.text: flighted with drift on the pads, it's full, and he drives it to leg for a single
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: goes on the back foot to let the ball turn and cuts to point
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: goes forward this time to drive the ball with the turn towards cover point
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: slower through the air on middle, forward lean and blocked
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: short and flat on middle now, he goes back and punches on off
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: leans into the drive this time for the full delivery and cover goes to his right to get a hand
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: angling into the batsman, can't connect while trying to tuck it to leg and only manages an edge onto his pads
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: a bouncer at 138kmh and Mehidy sways out of the line to let it go
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: goes for the stumps now with good length, Mehidy defends and just about gets an inside edge to the leg side
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: drives on the up on the off side and thick edge runs away to third man
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: stays on the back foot to watchfully defend the short of length ball on off
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: almost a replay as Sabbir covers the stumps to defend the ball back
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.preText: Astle's last over. Can he take one more?
items.text: bit of flight on off, blocked on the off side
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: nicely flighted with some drift around the batsman's feet, he drives it down nicely to long-off
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full and flighted outside off, driven down to long-off again
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: just wide of cover as Mehidy drives the full delivery on the up outside off, in the air and wide of the diving fielder
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full on the stumps now, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: flipper on the stumps, he goes back to make room and cuts it late behind square
items.postText: Astle completes his fine spell of 10 with 2 for 52, got the wicket of Mithun
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: little skiddy on length and on the stumps, driven down to mid-on
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: back of length around off and he tucks it to midwicket but no time for a single
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Sajed: "Very interesting recovery by Bangladesh. It is impressive to see Sabbir's return to be key, and the youngster Miraz working his way up."
items.text: dropped! Another catch put down, this one probably the toughest today. Mehidy saw the width and slashed hard outside off, it went high an parabolic towards deep point where Nicholls back-pedalled towards the rope, even got both hands to it over his head with a mini-jump but lost a bit of balance and let the ball out
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs
Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run
